name: CloudScene Digital Signage
overview:
CloudScene Digital Signage is distributed by AIT Partnership Group Ltd.

With over 10 years’ experience our fully trained engineers have the first hand technical knowledge to support our resellers and help end customers to get the most out of their CloudScene Digital Signage solutions.

Who we are

Located in Reading in the UK, AIT provides a full range of professional technical services and system integration including project design, bespoke software development, project management, installation and 24/7 maintenance support. An independent trusted source of information to many of our resellers and clients, AIT customers include British Airways, University of Nottingham, UCLH and the Corus Group.

AIT is the sole UK distributor for CloudScene Digital Signage. Our Promise

AIT is committed to using its expertise to provide the best digital signage products at the most compelling price points for resellers to delight end customers, their staff and patrons.
